name: ruby-asciidoctor

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
A fast, open source text processor and publishing toolchain for
converting AsciiDoc content to HTML 5, DocBook 5, and other formats.

dependencies.name: ruby
dependencies.description:
A dynamic, open source programming language with a focus on simplicity
and productivity.

dependent_to.name: chrony
dependent_to.description:
chrony is a versatile implementation of the Network Time Protocol (NTP).
It can synchronise the system clock with NTP servers, reference
clocks(e.g. GPS receiver), and manual input using wristwatch and
keyboard.

dependent_to.name: keepassxc
dependent_to.description:
KeePassXC - Cross-Platform Password Manager, modern, secure, and open-
source.
